alert.note: Alert for Harvey; Reno (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 3:59PM CDT until June 09 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RENO AND WEST CENTRAL HARVEY COUNTIES... At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southeast of Hutchinson, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Burrton and Hutchinson Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
